mapper.select: SELECT sk.seckill_id, sk.userphone, dk.create_time, sk.status, s.seckill_id as "seckill.seckill_id", s.name as "seckill.seckill_name", s.number as "seckill.number", s.start_time as "seckill.start_time", s.end_time as "seckill.end_time", s.create_time as "seckill.create_time" from success_killed sk INNER JOIN seckill s on sk.seckill_id=s.seckill_id where sk.seckill_id=#{seckillId}
